thread.title: Arsenal join Ross Barkley transfer scrap with the England midfielder's Everton future in doubt
thread.title_full: Arsenal join Ross Barkley transfer scrap with the England midfielder's Everton future in doubt

author: Steve Stammers
title: Arsenal join Ross Barkley transfer scrap with the England midfielder's Everton future in doubt
text:
Sport Arsenal join Ross Barkley transfer scrap with the England midfielder's Everton future in doubt 22-year-old set to be sold this summer unless he signs a new contract is already a target for Chelsea and Spurs Share Barkley would bring some much-needed power to the Arsenal midfielder (Photo: REUTERS) Share Get Arsenal FC updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Arsenal will join the chase for Ross Barkley if the Everton midfielder is put up for sale this summer. 
Toffees manager Ronald Koeman said last week that the 22-year-old would be sold if he does not sign a new contract. 
Barkley – named by England manager Gareth Southgate on Thursday in the squad for this month's games against Germany and Lithuania – will have just one season left on his current deal at the end of this season. Koeman would get millions for Barkley this summer but just peanuts next year (Photo: Action Images/Reuters) Read More 
He has stalled on signing a new one, and that has alerted the likes of Tottenham and champions-elect Chelsea to his possible availability. 
Arsenal can now be added to that list. 
They are are short of a player of Barkley’s power in midfield, so he would be an ideal addition. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
